price: (Yosef) kaa sε: “Onyame mpa ngu sε yεbεfa obi foforͻ a εnyε nea yɛhunuu y’adeε no wͻ ne hͻ. (Sε yεyε saa a) nokorε sε na yɛayε abͻnefoͻ.
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
